description: In the ever-evolving landscape of education, artificial intelligence (AI) is becoming increasingly prevalent in university classrooms. While some professors embrace AI as a valuable tool for research projects, others are more cautious. Ajay Parasram, a professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, falls into the latter category. title: Stellar Lumen (XLM) Loses Bullish Grip, Causing Investors to Switch to A New Fast-growing Meme Coin
description: Crypto investors often face a battle between bullish and bearish markets. They’re always on the lookout for the most profitable investments.
